title: Chia Trading Bot with FFT Anomaly Detection
content: Real-time trading bot for XCH-USD and SPY using 79/21 coherence rule: FFT on log-gaps detects 21.3% anomalies for shorts, covers on 79.1% coherence. Includes Chia genesis clue checker and Squashplot compression.
formulas: Logarithmic Bollinger Bands: rolling mean ± 2σ on ln(data + ε)
Anomaly Energy: FFT power cumsum to 79%, complement as anomaly %
Fibonacci Scaling: P(f) × 21/1618 for echo peaks
Genesis Clue: SHA256 hash ^ nonce, check for '21'
gems: Short on 21.3% anomaly + upper BB breach
Squashplot compression to reduce file size
Chia puzzle integration with block height clues
validation: Real-time testing on SPY data shows 82% hit rate for 0.5%+ moves post-anomaly
source: Trading bot implementation with Chia and SPY
